title: Gregg Popovich on America in 2020, the Leadership Void, and What Needs to Change | Flying Coach With Steve Kerr and Pete Carroll
description:
Steve and Pete are joined by San Antonio Spurs head coach Gregg Popovich to have a conversation about the state of our nation, how we got here as a country, our absence of leadership, and how we can take action to grow and bring about change following the killing of George Floyd by a Minneapolis police officer.
Host: Steve Kerr and Pete Carroll
Guest: Gregg Popovich
This show is raising money for COVID-19 relief. You can help! Donate here!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
